_comment: 단계별 SVG 아이콘 라이브러리. stroke 기반, 색상은 CSS 변수로 제어.

step_icons.name: mindset
step_icons.label: 뇌/마인드셋
step_icons.svg: <svg viewBox="0 0 48 48" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M24 38V26"/><path d="M16 20c0-4.4 3.6-8 8-8s8 3.6 8 8c0 3-1.7 5.7-4.2 7.1"/><path d="M19.8 27.1C17.3 25.7 15.6 23 15.6 20"/><circle cx="24" cy="14" r="2"/><path d="M18 18l-2-2"/><path d="M30 18l2-2"/></svg>
